participant_abstract.sent: The design team presented a prototype (which had 3 different colours of buttons which had not been previously discussed), and after a financial and marketing assessment of the prototype it was decided to use a plastic cover instead of rubber and the volume buttons were made into fruits (possibly lemons).
The product was within budget and had a favourable marketability.

participant_decisions.sent: use a plastic case instead of rubber to cut costs.
Make the volume buttons into a special form (lemons) to offset the reduction in 'trendiness' and to use some of the spare budget.
